question_stem:
Question 3
The coefficient for weight was found to be 1.69. Select the correct interpretation.
A
For every 1kg increase in weight, satell increases by 1.69
B
For every 1.69 increase in weight, satell increases by 1
C
For every 1kg increase in weight, satell increases by a factor of 1.69 
D
The correlation coefficient of weight and satell is 1.69
question_stem_html:
Question 3
The coefficient for weight was found to be 1.69. Select the correct interpretation.
A
For every 1kg increase in weight, satell increases by 1.69
B
For every 1.69 increase in weight, satell increases by 1
C

D

choices.text: or every 1.69 increase in weight, satell increases by 1
choices.text_html: or every 1.69 increase in weight, satell increases by 1

choices.text: or every 1kg increase in weight, satell increases by a factor of 1.69
